h1: font-family: 'Inter', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 2.5rem; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: -0.5px; margin-top: 2.5rem; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; color: #182133;
h2: font-family: 'Inter', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 1.75rem; font-weight: 600; letter-spacing: -0.2px; margin-top: 2rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; color: #213249;
h3: font-family: 'Inter', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 1.25rem; font-weight: 500; margin-top: 1.5rem; margin-bottom: 0.8rem; color: #2d3a4d;
h4: font-family: 'Inter', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 1.1rem; font-weight: 500; margin-top: 1.2rem; margin-bottom: 0.6rem; color: #55617c;
p: font-family: 'Inter', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 1.06rem; line-height: 1.7; margin-bottom: 1.1rem; color: #222a35;
ul: font-family: 'Inter', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; list-style-type: disc; margin: 1rem 0 1rem 1.5rem; padding-left: 0.2rem;
ol: font-family: 'Inter', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; list-style-type: decimal; margin: 1rem 0 1rem 1.5rem; padding-left: 0.2rem;
code: font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', 'Fira Mono', 'Consolas', monospace; background: #23272e; color: #f6f8fa; padding: 0.18em 0.5em; border-radius: 5px; font-size: 0.97em;
pre: font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', 'Fira Mono', 'Consolas', monospace; background: #23272e; color: #f6f8fa; border: none; padding: 1em 1.5em; border-radius: 8px; margin: 1.5rem 0; overflow-x: auto; font-size: 0.97em;
blockquote: border-left: 4px solid #29b6f6; background: #f9fbfd; color: #475266; padding: 1rem 1.5rem; margin: 1.5rem 0; font-style: italic; font-size: 1.07rem;
a: color: #2d88ff; text-decoration: underline; font-weight: 500; transition: color 0.15s; &:hover { color: #136ad1; }
img: max-width: 100%; height: auto; margin: 1.2rem 0; border-radius: 7px; box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(44,54,80,0.10);
table: font-family: 'Inter', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; border-collapse: separate; border-spacing: 0; width: 100%; margin: 1.5rem 0; background: #f8fafc;
th: border: none; background: #e5ecf6; padding: 1em 0.7em; text-align: left; font-weight: 600; color: #213249;
customCSS: body { background: #f5f7fa; } .document-container { max-width: 860px; margin: 2.5rem auto; padding: 2.2rem 2rem; background: #fff; border-radius: 14px; box-shadow: 0 4px 24px rgba(36,40,48,0.08); } h1:first-child { margin-top: 0; } ul ul, ol ol, ul ol, ol ul { margin: 0.5rem 0 0.5rem 1rem; } pre code { background: none; border: none; padding: 0; }
